item.title: MS-607 North at I-10
item.description: MS-607 north at I-10. Use I-10 east for Mobile (AL); I-10 west for New Orleans (LA) and I-12. Continue north on MS-607 for Stennis Space Center. The I-12 shield contains the text MISSISSIPPI, but the highway never enters Mississippi.

item.title: Mississippi Welcome Center Access Road at MS-607
item.description: Mississippi Welcome Center Access Road at MS-607. Turn right for MS-607 South to US-90; left for MS-607 North to I-10.

item.title: I-10 East Exit 2 Offramp at MS-607
item.description: I-10 East Exit 2 Offramp at MS-607 - Hancock County.

item.title: I-10 East at Exit 2 Offramp
item.description: I-10 East at Exit 2 offramp. Turn left on MS-607 North for NASA/Stennis Space Center/Official Business. Turn right for MS-607 South Stennis Space Center/Infinity/Waveland.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 2
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 2 - MS-607/NASA/John C. Stennis Space Center/Waveland.
